Service Details: - Offers a transportation program with volunteers who use their own vehicles to drive residents of Peachland to appointments, shopping, or banking- Allows individuals to stay longer in their own home and within the community
How to Apply: Riders are asked to contact the Peachland Wellness Centre office at least 24 hours before the transportation is required to make arrangements.
Cost: Suggested driver donation:  - Kelowna (downtown and KGH), $15  - Kelowna (past Gordon Dr), $17  - Penticton, $20  - Summerland, $15  - West Kelowna (main area), $8  - Westside (Daimler to bridge), $10  - Kelowna (Sexsmith Rd to Quail Ridge Blvd,) $20  - Peachland, $3  - Additional stops (Max. 2), $2 each  Riders give donation to driver
